snippet: Can a modern family make a home among hordes of tourists under the watchful eye of England’s National Trust? The grandson of Vita Sackville-West and Harold Nicolson attempts to bring Sissinghurst, one of the most famous gardens in the world, into...
lead_paragraph: Can a modern family make a home among hordes of tourists under the watchful eye of England’s National Trust? The grandson of Vita Sackville-West and Harold Nicolson attempts to bring Sissinghurst, one of the most famous gardens in the world, into the 21st century.
